jobDescription: Snowflake started with a clear vision: make modern data warehousing effective, affordable, and accessible to all data users. Because traditional on-premises and cloud solutions struggle with this, Snowflake developed an innovative product with a new built-for-the-cloud architecture that combines the power of data warehousing, the flexibility of big data platforms, and the elasticity of the cloud at a fraction of the cost of traditional solutions. Snowflake: Your data, no limits.As a Data Analyst for our Finance team, your work is used to uncover insights about the financial operations of Snowflake, helping to drive important strategic decisions. You will join a small, growing finance team and also work with some of the leading data scientists and engineers in the field.We are looking for someone who is passionate about analytics and is able to approach complex problems in an organized and detail-oriented manner.
